Description: NTLMv1 is a legacy authentication protocol with weak encryption that allows attackers to easily retrieve credentials from the network and perform NTLM Relay attacks.
Remediation: Create a Group Policy Object to disable NTLMv1 protocols. Additionally, diabling these protocols in a "Golden Image" is recommeded.
